title: Calories in a Macaron
meta_description: Discover calories in a macaron, including carbs, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per cookie with tips and variations.
assumptions: Standard French macaron (almond meringue shell with ganache or buttercream filling), average size ~15 g, no toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, filling type, brand, size, and recipe; homemade vs. store-bought differs. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard macaron contains about 70 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a macaron?
faqs.a: About 70 kcal for one standard macaron.
Yes, typically 8 g sugars per macaron from the meringue and filling.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a macaron?
faqs.a: Around 1.5 g protein per macaron, mainly from almonds.
A small amount, about 0.5 g per macaron from almond flour.
